info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 6:20PM EDT until August 03 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Essex County in northern New York... Northern Addison County in central Vermont... Southern Chittenden County in northwestern Vermont... Western Washington County in central Vermont... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 620 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ferrisburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Vergennes, Westport, Monkton Ridge, Lincoln, Monkton, Monkton Boro, New Haven, Hinesburg, Starksboro, Ferrisburg, Charlotte, Waltham, Bristol, Waitsfield, Fayston, Panton, Bolton, Mt. Philo State Park, Huntington, and Kingsland Bay State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
